name: app-store-assets
description: App Store screenshots and preview video

scripts.render:screenshots: npm run render:67 && npm run render:65 && npm run render:55
scripts.render:67: remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-67-1 out/screenshots/67/1.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-67-2 out/screenshots/67/2.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-67-3 out/screenshots/67/3.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-67-4 out/screenshots/67/4.png
scripts.render:65: remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-65-1 out/screenshots/65/1.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-65-2 out/screenshots/65/2.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-65-3 out/screenshots/65/3.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-65-4 out/screenshots/65/4.png
scripts.render:55: remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-55-1 out/screenshots/55/1.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-55-2 out/screenshots/55/2.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-55-3 out/screenshots/55/3.png && remotion still src/index.ts Screenshot-55-4 out/screenshots/55/4.png
scripts.render:all: npm run render:screenshots && npm run render:video
